QuestData.Title: Decisive Action
QuestData.Description: Zandalari warships plunder the seas around this island. They ferry in soldiers and war beasts from Zandalar to bolster Lei Shen's army.$B$BIf we can capture the palace shipyard, the Thunder King's supply line will be cut off, and your foothold here will be secure.$B$BI have a plan to do just that, and it won't take an entire army.
QuestData.LogDescription: Infiltrate Stormsea Landing and open the courtyard gate from within. Speak with Taoshi to begin the mission.
